name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, quick-witted humanoids that have built one of the most spectacular and advanced societies on Atlah. Goblins are typically born with a more purple hue, but turn green in their later years due to their civilization being built on the dark side of the moon where the green glow of Viridus is always directly overhead. The goblin love of creating has created a culture of meritocracy where those in power are the best crafters.

options.name: Small
options.description: Goblins are small creatures. All of your finesse skills are upgraded and your physique skills downgraded. You also have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

options.name: Quick Metabolism
options.description: Goblins must eat twice as much as their Size requires, but they gain an extra Dice worth of benefits from Food, Snacks and Potions.

options.name: Action : Squeeze By
options.description: You take a modified version of the Move Action that allows you to pass through any Creature without provoking Reactions, as long as your Movement ends within an unoccupied space. Additionally, you can fit through tight spaces as if you were one size Smaller.

options.name: Goblin Ingenuity
options.description: Your natural creativity and crafting prowess grants you an edge with tools and inventions. Gain +1 Engineering and +1 Logic.
